00108 void InitNewOverheadDB( UINT8 ubTilesetID )
00109 {
00110       UINT32                              uiLoop;
00111       VOBJECT_DESC   VObjectDesc;
00112       HVOBJECT             hVObject;
00113       CHAR8 cFileBPP[128];
00114       CHAR8 cAdjustedFile[ 128 ];
00115       UINT32                              cnt1, cnt2;
00116       SMALL_TILE_SURF   s;
00117       UINT32                              NumRegions;
00118       UINT32                              dbSize = 0;
00119 
00120       
00121       for (uiLoop = 0; uiLoop < NUMBEROFTILETYPES; uiLoop++)
00122       {
00123 
00124             // Create video object
00125 
00126             // Adjust for BPP
00127             FilenameForBPP( gTilesets[ ubTilesetID ].TileSurfaceFilenames[ uiLoop ], cFileBPP);
00128 
00129             // Adjust for tileset position
00130             sprintf( cAdjustedFile, "TILESETS\\%d\\T\\%s", ubTilesetID, cFileBPP ); 
00131 
00132             VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags = VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00133             strcpy( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, cAdjustedFile);
00134             hVObject = CreateVideoObject( &VObjectDesc );
00135 
00136             if ( hVObject == NULL )
00137             {
00138                   // TRY loading from default directory
00139                   FilenameForBPP( gTilesets[ TLS_GENERIC_1 ].TileSurfaceFilenames[ uiLoop ], cFileBPP);
00140                   // Adjust for tileset position
00141                   sprintf( cAdjustedFile, "TILESETS\\0\\T\\%s", cFileBPP );   
00142 
00143                   // LOAD ONE WE KNOW ABOUT!
00144                   VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags = VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00145                   strcpy( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, cAdjustedFile );
00146                   hVObject = CreateVideoObject( &VObjectDesc );
00147 
00148                   if ( hVObject == NULL )
00149                   {
00150                         // LOAD ONE WE KNOW ABOUT!
00151                         VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags = VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00152                         strcpy( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, "TILESETS\\0\\T\\grass.sti");
00153                         hVObject = CreateVideoObject( &VObjectDesc );
00154                   }
00155             }
00156 
00157             gSmTileSurf[ uiLoop ].vo                        = hVObject;
00158             gSmTileSurf[ uiLoop ].fType         =     uiLoop;
00159       }
00160 
00161       // NOW LOOP THROUGH AND CREATE DATABASE
00162       for( cnt1 = 0; cnt1 < NUMBEROFTILETYPES; cnt1++ )
00163       {
00164             // Get number of regions
00165             s = gSmTileSurf[ cnt1 ];
00166 
00167             NumRegions = s.vo->usNumberOfObjects;
00168                   
00169             // Check for overflow
00170             if ( NumRegions > gNumTilesPerType[ cnt1 ] )
00171             {
00172                         // Cutof
00173                         NumRegions = gNumTilesPerType[ cnt1 ];
00174             }
00175 
00176             for( cnt2 = 0; cnt2 < NumRegions; cnt2++ )
00177             {
00178 
00179                   gSmTileDB[ dbSize ].vo                                = s.vo;
00180                   gSmTileDB[ dbSize ].usSubIndex            = (UINT16)cnt2;
00181                   gSmTileDB[ dbSize ].fType                             = cnt1;
00182 
00183                   dbSize++;
00184             }
00185 
00186             // Check if data matches what should be there
00187             if ( NumRegions < gNumTilesPerType[ cnt1 ] )
00188             {
00189                         // Do underflows here
00190                         for ( cnt2 = NumRegions; cnt2 < gNumTilesPerType[ cnt1 ]; cnt2++ )
00191                         {
00192                               gSmTileDB[ dbSize ].vo                                = s.vo;
00193                               gSmTileDB[ dbSize ].usSubIndex            = 0;
00194                               gSmTileDB[ dbSize ].fType                             = cnt1;
00195                               dbSize++;
00196                         }
00197 
00198             }
00199       }
00200 
00201       gsStartRestrictedX = 0;
00202       gsStartRestrictedY = 0;
00203 
00204       // Calculate Scale factors because of restricted map scroll regions
00205       if ( gMapInformation.ubRestrictedScrollID != 0 )
00206       {
00207             INT16 sX1, sY1, sX2, sY2;
00208 
00209             CalculateRestrictedMapCoords( NORTH, &sX1, &sY1, &sX2, &gsStartRestrictedY, iOffsetHorizontal + 640, iOffsetVertical + 320 );
00210             CalculateRestrictedMapCoords( EAST,  &sX1, &sY1, &gsStartRestrictedX, &sY2, iOffsetHorizontal + 640, iOffsetVertical + 320 );
00211       }
00212 
00213       // Copy over shade tables from main tileset
00214       CopyOverheadDBShadetablesFromTileset( );
00215 }

00221

00224             DeleteVideoObject( gSmTileSurf[ cnt ].vo );
00225       }
00226 
00227 }

00230 BOOLEAN GetClosestItemPool( INT16 sSweetGridNo, ITEM_POOL **ppReturnedItemPool, UINT8 ubRadius, INT8 bLevel )
00231 {
00232       INT16  sTop, sBottom;
00233       INT16  sLeft, sRight;
00234       INT16  cnt1, cnt2;
00235       INT16       sGridNo;
00236       INT32       uiRange, uiLowestRange = 999999;
00237       INT32                         leftmost;
00238       BOOLEAN     fFound = FALSE;
00239       ITEM_POOL   *pItemPool;
00240       
00241       //create dummy soldier, and use the pathing to determine which nearby slots are
00242       //reachable.
00243 
00244       sTop        = ubRadius;
00245       sBottom = -ubRadius;
00246       sLeft   = - ubRadius;
00247       sRight  = ubRadius;
00248       
00249       uiLowestRange = 999999; 
00250 
00251       for( cnt1 = sBottom; cnt1 <= sTop; cnt1++ )
00252       {
00253             leftmost = ( ( sSweetGridNo + ( WORLD_COLS * cnt1 ) )/ WORLD_COLS ) * WORLD_COLS;
00254 
00255             for( cnt2 = sLeft; cnt2 <= sRight; cnt2++ )
00256             {
00257                   sGridNo = sSweetGridNo + ( WORLD_COLS * cnt1 ) + cnt2;
00258                   if( sGridNo >=0 && sGridNo < WORLD_MAX && sGridNo >= leftmost && sGridNo < ( leftmost + WORLD_COLS ) )
00259                   {
00260                         // Go on sweet stop
00261                         if ( GetItemPool( sGridNo, &pItemPool, bLevel ) )
00262                         {
00263                               uiRange = GetRangeInCellCoordsFromGridNoDiff( sSweetGridNo, sGridNo );
00264 
00265                               if ( uiRange < uiLowestRange )
00266                               {
00267                                     (*ppReturnedItemPool) = pItemPool;
00268                                     uiLowestRange = uiRange;
00269                                     fFound = TRUE;
00270                               }
00271                         }
00272                   }
00273             }
00274       }
00275 
00276       return( fFound );
00277 }

00279 BOOLEAN GetClosestMercInOverheadMap( INT16 sSweetGridNo, SOLDIERTYPE **ppReturnedSoldier, UINT8 ubRadius )
00280 {
00281       INT16  sTop, sBottom;
00282       INT16  sLeft, sRight;
00283       INT16  cnt1, cnt2;
00284       INT16       sGridNo;
00285       INT32       uiRange, uiLowestRange = 999999;
00286       INT32                         leftmost;
00287       BOOLEAN     fFound = FALSE;
00288       
00289       //create dummy soldier, and use the pathing to determine which nearby slots are
00290       //reachable.
00291 
00292       sTop        = ubRadius;
00293       sBottom = -ubRadius;
00294       sLeft   = - ubRadius;
00295       sRight  = ubRadius;
00296       
00297       uiLowestRange = 999999; 
00298 
00299       for( cnt1 = sBottom; cnt1 <= sTop; cnt1++ )
00300       {
00301             leftmost = ( ( sSweetGridNo + ( WORLD_COLS * cnt1 ) )/ WORLD_COLS ) * WORLD_COLS;
00302 
00303             for( cnt2 = sLeft; cnt2 <= sRight; cnt2++ )
00304             {
00305                   sGridNo = sSweetGridNo + ( WORLD_COLS * cnt1 ) + cnt2;
00306 
00307                   if( sGridNo >=0 && sGridNo < WORLD_MAX && sGridNo >= leftmost && sGridNo < ( leftmost + WORLD_COLS ) )
00308                   {
00309                         // Go on sweet stop
00310         if ( gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].pMercHead != NULL && gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].pMercHead->pSoldier->bVisible != -1 )
00311                         {
00312                               uiRange = GetRangeInCellCoordsFromGridNoDiff( sSweetGridNo, sGridNo );
00313 
00314                               if ( uiRange < uiLowestRange )
00315                               {
00316                                     (*ppReturnedSoldier) = gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].pMercHead->pSoldier;
00317                                     uiLowestRange = uiRange;
00318                                     fFound = TRUE;
00319                               }
00320                         }
00321                   }
00322             }
00323       }
00324 
00325       return( fFound );
00326 }

00329 void DisplayMercNameInOverhead( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
00330 {
00331       INT16       sWorldScreenX, sX;
00332       INT16       sWorldScreenY, sY;
00333 
00334       // Get Screen position of guy.....
00335       GetWorldXYAbsoluteScreenXY( ( pSoldier->sX / CELL_X_SIZE ), ( pSoldier->sY / CELL_Y_SIZE ), &sWorldScreenX, &sWorldScreenY );
00336 
00337       sWorldScreenX = gsStartRestrictedX + ( sWorldScreenX / 5 ) + 5;
00338       sWorldScreenY = gsStartRestrictedY + ( sWorldScreenY / 5 ) + ( pSoldier->sHeightAdjustment / 5 ) + (gpWorldLevelData[ pSoldier->sGridNo ].sHeight/5) - 8;
00339 
00340       sWorldScreenY += ( gsRenderHeight / 5 );
00341 
00342       // Display name
00343       SetFont( TINYFONT1 );
00344       SetFontBackground( FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK );
00345       SetFontForeground( FONT_MCOLOR_WHITE );
00346 
00347       // Center here....
00348       FindFontCenterCoordinates( sWorldScreenX, sWorldScreenY, (INT16)( 1 ), 1, pSoldier->name, TINYFONT1, &sX, &sY );
00349 
00350       // Full size maps
00351       if (gsStartRestrictedX == 0)
00352       {
00353             sX += iOffsetHorizontal;
00354       }
00355 
00356       // Full size maps
00357       if (gsStartRestrictedY == 0)
00358       {
00359             sY += iOffsetVertical;
00360       }
00361 
00362       // OK, selected guy is here...
00363       gprintfdirty( sX, sY, pSoldier->name );
00364       mprintf( sX, sY, pSoldier->name );
00365 }

00368 void HandleOverheadMap( )
00369 {
00370       static BOOLEAN fFirst = TRUE;
00371       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
00372 
00373       if ( fFirst )
00374       {
00375             fFirst = FALSE;
00376       }
00377 
00378       gfInOverheadMap = TRUE;
00379       gfOverItemPool    = FALSE;
00380 
00381 
00382       // Check tileset numbers
00383       if ( gubSmTileNum != giCurrentTilesetID )
00384       {
00385             // If loaded, unload!
00386             if ( gfSmTileLoaded )
00387             {
00388                   //Unload
00389                   DeleteOverheadDB( );
00390 
00391                   // Force load
00392                   gfSmTileLoaded = FALSE;
00393             }           
00394       }
00395 
00396       gubSmTileNum = (UINT8)giCurrentTilesetID;
00397 
00398 
00399       if ( gfSmTileLoaded == FALSE )
00400       {
00401             // LOAD LAND
00402             InitNewOverheadDB( gubSmTileNum );
00403             gfSmTileLoaded = TRUE;
00404       }
00405       
00406       // restore background rects
00407       RestoreBackgroundRects( );
00408 
00409       // Render the overhead map
00410       RenderOverheadMap( 0, (WORLD_COLS / 2), iOffsetHorizontal, 
00411             iOffsetVertical, 640 + iOffsetHorizontal, 320 + iOffsetVertical, FALSE );
00412 
00413       HandleTalkingAutoFaces( );
00414 
00415       if( !gfEditMode )
00416       {
00417             // CHECK FOR UI
00418             if( gfTacticalPlacementGUIActive )
00419             {
00420                   TacticalPlacementHandle();
00421                   if( !gfTacticalPlacementGUIActive )
00422                   {
00423                         return;
00424                   }
00425             }
00426             else
00427             {
00428                   HandleOverheadUI();
00429 
00430                   if ( !gfInOverheadMap )
00431                   {           
00432                         return;
00433                   }
00434                   RenderTacticalInterface( );
00435                   RenderRadarScreen( );
00436 
00437 /* i didnt check when it was rendered so i commented it :P
00438  * any questions? joker
00439  */
00440 //                RenderClock( CLOCK_X, CLOCK_Y );
00441 //                RenderTownIDString( );
00442 
00443       HandleAutoFaces( );
00444             }
00445       }
00446 
00447       if( !gfEditMode && !gfTacticalPlacementGUIActive )
00448       {
00449             INT16 usMapPos;
00450             ITEM_POOL   *pItemPool;
00451 
00452             gfUIHandleSelectionAboveGuy               = FALSE;
00453 
00454             HandleAnyMercInSquadHasCompatibleStuff( (INT8) CurrentSquad( ), NULL, TRUE );
00455 
00456             if ( GetOverheadMouseGridNo( &usMapPos ) )
00457             {
00458                   // ATE: Find the closest item pool within 5 tiles....
00459                   if ( GetClosestItemPool( usMapPos, &pItemPool, 1, 0 ) )
00460                   {
00461                         STRUCTURE                           *pStructure = NULL;
00462                         INT16                                     sIntTileGridNo;
00463                         INT8                                      bZLevel = 0;
00464                         INT16                                     sActionGridNo = usMapPos;
00465 
00466                         // Get interactive tile...
00467                         if ( ConditionalGetCurInteractiveTileGridNoAndStructure( &sIntTileGridNo , &pStructure, FALSE ) )
00468                         {
00469                               sActionGridNo = sIntTileGridNo;
00470                         }
00471                         
00472                         bZLevel = GetZLevelOfItemPoolGivenStructure( sActionGridNo, 0, pStructure );
00473 
00474                         if ( AnyItemsVisibleOnLevel( pItemPool, bZLevel ) )
00475                         {
00476                               DrawItemPoolList( pItemPool, usMapPos     , ITEMLIST_DISPLAY, bZLevel, gusMouseXPos, gusMouseYPos );
00477 
00478                               gfOverItemPool = TRUE;
00479                               gsOveritemPoolGridNo = pItemPool->sGridNo;
00480                         }
00481                   }
00482 
00483                   if ( GetClosestItemPool( usMapPos, &pItemPool, 1, 1 ) )
00484                   {
00485                         INT8                                      bZLevel = 0;
00486                         INT16                                     sActionGridNo = usMapPos;
00487 
00488                         if ( AnyItemsVisibleOnLevel( pItemPool, bZLevel ) )
00489                         {
00490                               DrawItemPoolList( pItemPool, usMapPos     , ITEMLIST_DISPLAY, bZLevel, gusMouseXPos, (UINT16)( gusMouseYPos - 5 ) );
00491 
00492                               gfOverItemPool = TRUE;
00493                               gsOveritemPoolGridNo = pItemPool->sGridNo;
00494                         }
00495                   }
00496 
00497     }
00498 
00499     if ( GetOverheadMouseGridNoForFullSoldiersGridNo( &usMapPos ) )
00500     {
00501                   if ( GetClosestMercInOverheadMap( usMapPos, &pSoldier, 1 ) )
00502                   {
00503         if ( pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum )
00504         {
00505               gfUIHandleSelectionAboveGuy             = TRUE;
00506           gsSelectedGuy                   = pSoldier->ubID;
00507         }
00508 
00509         DisplayMercNameInOverhead( pSoldier );
00510       }
00511             }
00512       }
00513 
00514 
00515       // Soldier dummy and items ...
00516       RenderOverheadOverlays();
00517 
00518 
00519       if( !gfEditMode && !gfTacticalPlacementGUIActive && gusSelectedSoldier != NOBODY )
00520       {
00521             pSoldier = MercPtrs[ gusSelectedSoldier ];
00522 
00523     DisplayMercNameInOverhead( pSoldier );
00524       }
00525 
00526       RenderButtons( );
00527       StartFrameBufferRender( );
00528 
00529       // save background rects
00530       SaveBackgroundRects( );
00531 
00532       RenderButtonsFastHelp();
00533 
00534       ExecuteBaseDirtyRectQueue( );
00535       EndFrameBufferRender( );
00536 
00537       fInterfacePanelDirty = FALSE;
00538 
00539 }

00545 
00546 void GoIntoOverheadMap( )
00547       {
00548   VOBJECT_DESC    VObjectDesc;
00549       HVOBJECT                      hVObject;
00550 
00551       gfInOverheadMap = TRUE;
00552 
00553       // WANNE 2 NEW
00554       //RestoreExternBackgroundRect( INTERFACE_START_X, INTERFACE_START_Y, SCREEN_WIDTH, INTERFACE_HEIGHT );
00555 
00556       // Overview map should be centered in the middle of the tactical screen.
00557       iOffsetHorizontal = (SCREEN_WIDTH / 2) - (640 / 2);         // Horizontal start postion of the overview map
00558       iOffsetVertical = (SCREEN_HEIGHT - 160) / 2 - 160;          // Vertical start position of the overview map
00559 
00560       MSYS_DefineRegion( &OverheadBackgroundRegion, 0, 0 , SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00561                                      CURSOR_NORMAL, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK );
00562 
00563       //Add region
00564       MSYS_AddRegion( &OverheadBackgroundRegion );
00565 
00566       MSYS_DefineRegion( &OverheadRegion, 0, 0 , SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00567                                      CURSOR_NORMAL, MoveOverheadRegionCallback, ClickOverheadRegionCallback );
00568 
00569       // Add region
00570       MSYS_AddRegion( &OverheadRegion );
00571 
00572 
00573       // LOAD CLOSE ANIM
00574       if (iResolution == 0)
00575       {
00576       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags = VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00577       FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\MAP_BORD.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00578       if( !AddVideoObject( &VObjectDesc, &uiOVERMAP ) )
00579             AssertMsg(0, "Missing INTERFACE\\MAP_BORD.sti" );
00580       }
00581       else if (iResolution == 1)
00582       {
00583             VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags = VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00584             FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\MAP_BORD_800x600.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00585             if( !AddVideoObject( &VObjectDesc, &uiOVERMAP ) )
00586                   AssertMsg(0, "Missing INTERFACE\\MAP_BORD_800x600.sti" );
00587       }
00588       else if (iResolution == 2)
00589       {
00590             VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags = VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00591             FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\MAP_BORD_1024x768.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00592             if( !AddVideoObject( &VObjectDesc, &uiOVERMAP ) )
00593                   AssertMsg(0, "Missing INTERFACE\\MAP_BORD_1024x768.sti" );
00594       }
00595 
00596       // LOAD PERSONS
00597       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags = VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00598       FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\PERSONS.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00599       if( !AddVideoObject( &VObjectDesc, &uiPERSONS ) )
00600             AssertMsg(0, "Missing INTERFACE\\PERSONS.sti" );
00601 
00602       // Add shades to persons....
00603       GetVideoObject( &hVObject, uiPERSONS );
00604       hVObject->pShades[ 0 ]          = Create16BPPPaletteShaded( hVObject->pPaletteEntry, 256, 256, 256, FALSE );
00605       hVObject->pShades[ 1 ]          = Create16BPPPaletteShaded( hVObject->pPaletteEntry, 310, 310, 310, FALSE );
00606       hVObject->pShades[ 2 ]          = Create16BPPPaletteShaded( hVObject->pPaletteEntry, 0, 0, 0, FALSE );
00607 
00608       gfOverheadMapDirty = TRUE;
00609 
00610       if( !gfEditMode )
00611       {
00612             // Make sure we are in team panel mode...
00613             gfSwitchPanel = TRUE;
00614             gbNewPanel = TEAM_PANEL;
00615             gubNewPanelParam = (UINT8)gusSelectedSoldier;
00616             fInterfacePanelDirty = DIRTYLEVEL2;
00617 
00618             // Disable tactical buttons......
00619             if( !gfEnterTacticalPlacementGUI )
00620             {
00621                   // Handle switch of panel....
00622                   HandleTacticalPanelSwitch( );
00623                   DisableTacticalTeamPanelButtons( TRUE );
00624             }
00625 
00626             EmptyBackgroundRects( );
00627       }
00628 
00629 }
00630 
00631 void HandleOverheadUI( )
00632 {
00633   InputAtom                         InputEvent;
00634       INT16                                     sMousePos=0;
00635       UINT8                                     ubID;
00636 
00637       // CHECK FOR MOUSE OVER REGIONS...
00638       if ( GetOverheadMouseGridNo( &sMousePos ) )
00639       {
00640             // Look quickly for a soldier....
00641             ubID =  QuickFindSoldier( sMousePos );
00642 
00643             if ( ubID != NOBODY )
00644             {
00645                   // OK, selected guy is here...
00646 
00647                   // WANNE <incomment>
00648                   //gprintfdirty( gusMouseXPos, gusMouseYPos, MercPtrs[ ubID ]->name );
00649                   //mprintf( gusMouseXPos, gusMouseYPos, MercPtrs[ ubID ]->name );
00650 
00651             }
00652       }
00653 
00654   while (DequeueEvent(&InputEvent) == TRUE)
00655   {
00656     if( ( InputEvent.usEvent == KEY_DOWN ) )
00657     { 
00658                   switch( InputEvent.usParam )
00659                   {
00660                         case( ESC ):
00661                         case( INSERT ):
00662 
00663                               KillOverheadMap();
00664                         break;
00665 
00666                         case( 'x' ):
00667                               if( ( InputEvent.usKeyState & ALT_DOWN ) )
00668                               {
00669                                     HandleShortCutExitState( );
00670                               }
00671                         break;
00672                   }
00673     }
00674       }
00675 }
00676 
00677 void KillOverheadMap()
00678 {
00679       gfInOverheadMap = FALSE;
00680       SetRenderFlags( RENDER_FLAG_FULL );
00681       RenderWorld( );
00682 
00683       MSYS_RemoveRegion(&OverheadRegion );
00684       MSYS_RemoveRegion(&OverheadBackgroundRegion );
00685 
00686       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( uiOVERMAP );
00687       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( uiPERSONS );
00688 
00689       HandleTacticalPanelSwitch( );
00690       DisableTacticalTeamPanelButtons( FALSE );
00691 
00692 }

00694 
00695 INT16 GetOffsetLandHeight( INT32 sGridNo )
00696 {
00697       INT16 sTileHeight;
00698       
00699       sTileHeight = gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].sHeight;
00700 
00701       return( sTileHeight );
00702 }
00703 
00704 INT16 GetModifiedOffsetLandHeight( INT32 sGridNo )
00705 {
00706       INT16 sTileHeight;
00707       INT16 sModifiedTileHeight;
00708 
00709       sTileHeight = gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].sHeight;
00710 
00711       sModifiedTileHeight = ( ( ( sTileHeight / 80 ) - 1 ) * 80 );
00712 
00713       if ( sModifiedTileHeight < 0 )
00714       {
00715             sModifiedTileHeight = 0;
00716       }
00717 
00718       return( sModifiedTileHeight );
00719 }

00721 
00722 void RenderOverheadMap( INT16 sStartPointX_M, INT16 sStartPointY_M, INT16 sStartPointX_S, INT16 sStartPointY_S, INT16 sEndXS, INT16 sEndYS, BOOLEAN fFromMapUtility )
00723 {
00724       INT8                    bXOddFlag = 0;
00725       INT16                   sModifiedHeight = 0;
00726       INT16                   sAnchorPosX_M, sAnchorPosY_M;
00727       INT16                   sAnchorPosX_S, sAnchorPosY_S;
00728       INT16                   sTempPosX_M, sTempPosY_M;
00729       INT16                   sTempPosX_S, sTempPosY_S;
00730       BOOLEAN                 fEndRenderRow = FALSE, fEndRenderCol = FALSE;
00731       UINT32                  usTileIndex;
00732       INT16                   sX, sY;
00733       UINT32                  uiDestPitchBYTES;
00734       UINT8                   *pDestBuf;
00735       LEVELNODE         *pNode; 
00736       SMALL_TILE_DB     *pTile;
00737       INT16                   sHeight;
00738       HVOBJECT hVObject;
00739       INT16                   sX1, sX2, sY1, sY2;
00740 
00741       // Get video object for persons...
00742       if ( !fFromMapUtility )
00743       {
00744             GetVideoObject( &hVObject, uiPERSONS );
00745       }
00746 
00747       if ( gfOverheadMapDirty )
00748       {
00749             //sStartPointX_S += 50;
00750             //sStartPointY_S += 20;
00751 
00752             // Black color for the background!
00753             //ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, sStartPointX_S, sStartPointY_S, sEndXS,  sEndYS, 0 );
00754 
00755             ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT, 0 );
00756 
00757             InvalidateScreen( );
00758             gfOverheadMapDirty = FALSE;
00759 
00760             // Begin Render Loop
00761             sAnchorPosX_M = sStartPointX_M;
00762             sAnchorPosY_M = sStartPointY_M;
00763 
00764             // sStartPointX_S ..... Start point of the overhead map
00765             sAnchorPosX_S = sStartPointX_S;
00766             sAnchorPosY_S = sStartPointY_S;
00767 
00768             // Zero out area!
00769             //ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, 0, 0, (INT16)(640), (INT16)(gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_END_Y), Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 0, 0, 0 ) ) );
00770 
00771             pDestBuf = LockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER, &uiDestPitchBYTES );
00772 
00773             // Nur Karte und position der gebude
00774             do
00775             {
00776                   fEndRenderRow = FALSE;
00777 
00778                   sTempPosX_M = sAnchorPosX_M;
00779                   sTempPosY_M = sAnchorPosY_M;
00780                   sTempPosX_S = sAnchorPosX_S;
00781                   sTempPosY_S = sAnchorPosY_S;
00782 
00783                   if(bXOddFlag > 0)
00784                         sTempPosX_S += 4;
00785 
00786 
00787                   do
00788                   {
00789                         // / 5 -> / 3
00790 
00791                         usTileIndex=FASTMAPROWCOLTOPOS( sTempPosY_M, sTempPosX_M );
00792 
00793                         if ( usTileIndex < GRIDSIZE )
00794                         {
00795                               sHeight=( GetOffsetLandHeight(usTileIndex) /5);
00796 
00797                               pNode = gpWorldLevelData[ usTileIndex ].pLandStart;
00798                               while( pNode != NULL )
00799                               {
00800 
00801                                     pTile = &( gSmTileDB[ pNode->usIndex ] );
00802 
00803                                     sX = sTempPosX_S;
00804                                     sY = sTempPosY_S - sHeight + ( gsRenderHeight / 5 );
00805 
00806                                     pTile->vo->pShadeCurrent= gSmTileSurf[ pTile->fType ].vo->pShades[pNode->ubShadeLevel];
00807 
00808                                     // RENDER!
00809                                     //BltVideoObjectFromIndex(  FRAME_BUFFER, SGR1, gSmallTileDatabase[ gpWorldLevelData[ usTileIndex ].pLandHead->usIndex ], sX, sY, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
00810                                     //BltVideoObjectFromIndex(  FRAME_BUFFER, SGR1, 0, sX, sY, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
00811                                     Blt8BPPDataTo16BPPBufferTransparent((UINT16*)pDestBuf, uiDestPitchBYTES, pTile->vo, sX, sY, pTile->usSubIndex );
00812 
00813                                     pNode = pNode->pPrevNode;
00814                               }
00815 
00816                         }
00817 
00818                         sTempPosX_S += 8;
00819                         sTempPosX_M ++;
00820                         sTempPosY_M --;
00821 
00822                         if ( sTempPosX_S >= sEndXS )
00823                         {
00824                               fEndRenderRow = TRUE;                                       
00825                         }
00826 
00827                   } while( !fEndRenderRow );
00828 
00829                   if ( bXOddFlag > 0 )
00830                   {
00831                         sAnchorPosY_M ++;
00832                   }
00833                   else
00834                   {
00835                         sAnchorPosX_M ++;
00836                   }
00837                   
00838 
00839                   bXOddFlag = !bXOddFlag;
00840                   sAnchorPosY_S += 2;
00841 
00842                   if ( sAnchorPosY_S >= sEndYS )
00843                   {
00844                         fEndRenderCol = TRUE;
00845                   }
00846 
00847             }
00848             while( !fEndRenderCol );
00849 
00850             // Begin Render Loop
00851             sAnchorPosX_M = sStartPointX_M;
00852             sAnchorPosY_M = sStartPointY_M;
00853             sAnchorPosX_S = sStartPointX_S;
00854             sAnchorPosY_S = sStartPointY_S;
00855             bXOddFlag = 0;
00856             fEndRenderRow = FALSE;
00857             fEndRenderCol = FALSE;
00858 
00859             do
00860             {
00861 
00862                   fEndRenderRow = FALSE;
00863                   sTempPosX_M = sAnchorPosX_M;
00864                   sTempPosY_M = sAnchorPosY_M;
00865                   sTempPosX_S = sAnchorPosX_S;
00866                   sTempPosY_S = sAnchorPosY_S;
00867 
00868                   if(bXOddFlag > 0)
00869                         sTempPosX_S += 4;
00870 
00871 
00872                   do
00873                   {
00874 
00875                         usTileIndex=FASTMAPROWCOLTOPOS( sTempPosY_M, sTempPosX_M );
00876 
00877                         if ( usTileIndex < GRIDSIZE )
00878                         {
00879                               sHeight=( GetOffsetLandHeight(usTileIndex) /5);
00880                               sModifiedHeight = ( GetModifiedOffsetLandHeight( usTileIndex ) / 5 );
00881 
00882                               pNode = gpWorldLevelData[ usTileIndex ].pObjectHead;
00883                               while( pNode != NULL )
00884                               {
00885 
00886                                     if ( pNode->usIndex < NUMBEROFTILES )
00887                                     {
00888                                           // Don't render itempools!
00889                                           if ( !( pNode->uiFlags & LEVELNODE_ITEM ) )
00890                                           {
00891                                                 pTile = &( gSmTileDB[ pNode->usIndex ] );
00892 
00893                                                 sX = sTempPosX_S;
00894                                                 sY = sTempPosY_S;
00895 
00896                                                 if( gTileDatabase[ pNode->usIndex ].uiFlags & IGNORE_WORLD_HEIGHT )
00897                                                 {
00898                                                       sY -= sModifiedHeight;
00899                                                 }
00900                                                 else
00901                                                 {
00902                                                       sY -= sHeight;
00903                                                 }
00904 
00905                                                 sY += ( gsRenderHeight / 5 );
00906 
00907                                                 pTile->vo->pShadeCurrent= gSmTileSurf[ pTile->fType ].vo->pShades[pNode->ubShadeLevel];
00908 
00909                                                 // RENDER!
00910                                                 Blt8BPPDataTo16BPPBufferTransparent((UINT16*)pDestBuf, uiDestPitchBYTES, pTile->vo, sX, sY, pTile->usSubIndex );
00911                                           }
00912                                     }
00913 
00914                                     pNode = pNode->pNext;
00915                               }
00916 
00917 
00918                               pNode = gpWorldLevelData[ usTileIndex ].pShadowHead;
00919                               while( pNode != NULL )
00920                               {
00921                                     if ( pNode->usIndex < NUMBEROFTILES )
00922                                     {
00923                                           pTile = &( gSmTileDB[ pNode->usIndex ] );
00924                                           sX = sTempPosX_S;
00925                                           sY = sTempPosY_S - sHeight;
00926 
00927                                           sY += ( gsRenderHeight / 5 );
00928 
00929                                           pTile->vo->pShadeCurrent= gSmTileSurf[ pTile->fType ].vo->pShades[pNode->ubShadeLevel];
00930 
00931                                           // RENDER!
00932                                           Blt8BPPDataTo16BPPBufferShadow((UINT16*)pDestBuf, uiDestPitchBYTES, pTile->vo, sX, sY, pTile->usSubIndex );
00933                                     }
00934 
00935                                     pNode = pNode->pNext;
00936                               }
00937 
00938                               pNode = gpWorldLevelData[ usTileIndex ].pStructHead;
00939 
00940                               while( pNode != NULL )
00941                               {
00942                                     if ( pNode->usIndex < NUMBEROFTILES )
00943                                     {
00944                                           // Don't render itempools!
00945                                           if ( !( pNode->uiFlags & LEVELNODE_ITEM ) )
00946                                           {
00947                                                 pTile = &( gSmTileDB[ pNode->usIndex ] );
00948 
00949                                                 sX = sTempPosX_S;
00950                                                 sY = sTempPosY_S - (gTileDatabase[ pNode->usIndex ].sOffsetHeight/5);
00951                                                       
00952                                                 if( gTileDatabase[ pNode->usIndex ].uiFlags & IGNORE_WORLD_HEIGHT )
00953                                                 {
00954                                                       sY -= sModifiedHeight;
00955                                                 }
00956                                                 else
00957                                                 {
00958                                                       sY -= sHeight;
00959                                                 }
00960 
00961                                                 sY += ( gsRenderHeight / 5 );
00962 
00963                                                 pTile->vo->pShadeCurrent= gSmTileSurf[ pTile->fType ].vo->pShades[pNode->ubShadeLevel];
00964 
00965                                                 // RENDER!
00966                                                 Blt8BPPDataTo16BPPBufferTransparent((UINT16*)pDestBuf, uiDestPitchBYTES, pTile->vo, sX, sY, pTile->usSubIndex );
00967                                           }
00968                                     }
00969 
00970                                     pNode = pNode->pNext;
00971                               }
00972                         }
00973                         
00974                         sTempPosX_S += 8;
00975                         sTempPosX_M ++;
00976                         sTempPosY_M --;
00977 
00978                         if ( sTempPosX_S >= sEndXS )
00979                         {
00980                               fEndRenderRow = TRUE;                                       
00981                         }
00982 
00983                   } while( !fEndRenderRow );
00984 
00985                   if ( bXOddFlag > 0 )
00986                   {
00987                         sAnchorPosY_M ++;
00988                   }
00989                   else
00990                   {
00991                         sAnchorPosX_M ++;
00992                   }
00993                   
00994 
00995                   bXOddFlag = !bXOddFlag;
00996                   sAnchorPosY_S += 2;
00997 
00998                   if ( sAnchorPosY_S >= sEndYS )
00999                   {
01000                         fEndRenderCol = TRUE;
01001                   }
01002 
01003             }
01004             while( !fEndRenderCol );
01005 
01006             //if ( !fFromMapUtility && !gfEditMode )
01007             {                             
01008 
01009                   // ROOF RENDR LOOP
01010                   // Begin Render Loop
01011                   sAnchorPosX_M = sStartPointX_M;
01012                   sAnchorPosY_M = sStartPointY_M;
01013                   sAnchorPosX_S = sStartPointX_S;
01014                   sAnchorPosY_S = sStartPointY_S;
01015                   bXOddFlag = 0;
01016                   fEndRenderRow = FALSE;
01017                   fEndRenderCol = FALSE;
01018 
01019                   do
01020                   {
01021 
01022                         fEndRenderRow = FALSE;
01023                         sTempPosX_M = sAnchorPosX_M;
01024                         sTempPosY_M = sAnchorPosY_M;
01025                         sTempPosX_S = sAnchorPosX_S;
01026                         sTempPosY_S = sAnchorPosY_S;
01027 
01028                         if(bXOddFlag > 0)
01029                               sTempPosX_S += 4;
01030 
01031                         do
01032                         {
01033                               usTileIndex=FASTMAPROWCOLTOPOS( sTempPosY_M, sTempPosX_M );
01034 
01035                               if ( usTileIndex < GRIDSIZE )
01036                               {
01037                                     sHeight=( GetOffsetLandHeight(usTileIndex) /5);
01038 
01039                                 pNode = gpWorldLevelData[ usTileIndex ].pRoofHead;
01040                                 while( pNode != NULL )
01041                                 {
01042                                       if ( pNode->usIndex < NUMBEROFTILES )
01043                                       {
01044                                             if ( !( pNode->uiFlags & LEVELNODE_HIDDEN ) )
01045                                             {
01046                                                   pTile = &( gSmTileDB[ pNode->usIndex ] );
01047 
01048                                                   sX = sTempPosX_S;
01049                                                   sY = sTempPosY_S - (gTileDatabase[ pNode->usIndex ].sOffsetHeight/5) -sHeight;
01050 
01051                                                   sY -= ( WALL_HEIGHT/5 );
01052 
01053                                                   sY += ( gsRenderHeight / 5 );
01054 
01055                                                   pTile->vo->pShadeCurrent= gSmTileSurf[ pTile->fType ].vo->pShades[pNode->ubShadeLevel];
01056 
01057                                                   // RENDER!
01058                                                   Blt8BPPDataTo16BPPBufferTransparent((UINT16*)pDestBuf, uiDestPitchBYTES, pTile->vo, sX, sY, pTile->usSubIndex );
01059                                             }
01060                                       }
01061                                       pNode = pNode->pNext;
01062                                 }
01063                               }
01064 
01065                               sTempPosX_S += 8;
01066                               sTempPosX_M ++;
01067                               sTempPosY_M --;
01068 
01069                               if ( sTempPosX_S >= sEndXS )
01070                               {
01071                                     fEndRenderRow = TRUE;                                       
01072                               }
01073 
01074                         } while( !fEndRenderRow );
01075 
01076                         if ( bXOddFlag > 0 )
01077                         {
01078                               sAnchorPosY_M ++;
01079                         }
01080                         else
01081                         {
01082                               sAnchorPosX_M ++;
01083                         }
01084                         
01085 
01086                         bXOddFlag = !bXOddFlag;
01087                         sAnchorPosY_S += 2;
01088 
01089                         if ( sAnchorPosY_S >= sEndYS )
01090                         {
01091                               fEndRenderCol = TRUE;
01092                         }
01093 
01094                   }
01095                   while( !fEndRenderCol );
01096             }
01097 
01098             UnLockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER );
01099 
01100             // OK, blacken out edges of smaller maps...
01101             if ( gMapInformation.ubRestrictedScrollID != 0 )
01102             {
01103                   CalculateRestrictedMapCoords( NORTH, &sX1, &sY1, &sX2, &sY2, sEndXS, sEndYS );
01104                   ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, sX1, sY1, sX2, sY2, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 0, 0, 0 ) ) ); 
01105 
01106                   CalculateRestrictedMapCoords( EAST, &sX1, &sY1, &sX2, &sY2, sEndXS, sEndYS );
01107                   ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, sX1, sY1, sX2, sY2, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 0, 0, 0 ) ) ); 
01108 
01109                   CalculateRestrictedMapCoords( SOUTH, &sX1, &sY1, &sX2, &sY2, sEndXS, sEndYS );
01110                   ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, sX1, sY1, sX2, sY2, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 0, 0, 0 ) ) ); 
01111 
01112                   CalculateRestrictedMapCoords( WEST, &sX1, &sY1, &sX2, &sY2, sEndXS, sEndYS );
01113                   ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, sX1, sY1, sX2, sY2, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 0, 0, 0 ) ) ); 
01114             }
01115 
01116             if ( !fFromMapUtility )
01117             {
01118                   // Render border!
01119                   BltVideoObjectFromIndex( FRAME_BUFFER, uiOVERMAP, 0, 0, 0, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
01120             }
01121 
01122     // Update the save buffer
01123     {
01124           UINT32 uiDestPitchBYTES, uiSrcPitchBYTES;
01125           UINT8    *pDestBuf, *pSrcBuf;
01126           UINT16 usWidth, usHeight;
01127           UINT8  ubBitDepth;
01128   
01129           // Update saved buffer - do for the viewport size ony!
01130           GetCurrentVideoSettings( &usWidth, &usHeight, &ubBitDepth );
01131 
01132           pSrcBuf = LockVideoSurface(guiRENDERBUFFER, &uiSrcPitchBYTES);
01133           pDestBuf = LockVideoSurface(guiSAVEBUFFER, &uiDestPitchBYTES);
01134 
01135           if(gbPixelDepth==16)
01136           {
01137                 // BLIT HERE
01138                 Blt16BPPTo16BPP((UINT16 *)pDestBuf, uiDestPitchBYTES, 
01139                                   (UINT16 *)pSrcBuf, uiSrcPitchBYTES,  
01140                                   0, 0, 0, 0, usWidth, usHeight );
01141           }
01142 
01143           UnLockVideoSurface(guiRENDERBUFFER);
01144           UnLockVideoSurface(guiSAVEBUFFER);
01145 
01146     }
01147       }
01148 }
01149 
01150 void RenderOverheadOverlays()
01151 {
01152       UINT32                  uiDestPitchBYTES;
01153       WORLDITEM         *pWorldItem;
01154       UINT32                        i;
01155       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
01156       HVOBJECT          hVObject;
01157       INT16                   sX, sY;
01158       UINT16                  end;
01159       UINT16                  usLineColor=0;
01160       UINT8                   *pDestBuf;
01161       UINT8                   ubPassengers = 0;
01162 
01163       pDestBuf = LockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER, &uiDestPitchBYTES );
01164       GetVideoObject( &hVObject, uiPERSONS );
01165 
01166 
01167       //SOLDIER OVERLAY 
01168       if( gfTacticalPlacementGUIActive )
01169       { //loop through only the player soldiers
01170             end = gTacticalStatus.Team[ OUR_TEAM ].bLastID;
01171       }
01172       else
01173       { //loop through all soldiers.
01174             end = MAX_NUM_SOLDIERS;
01175       }
01176 
01177       for( i = 0; i < end; i++ )
01178       {
01179             //First, check to see if the soldier exists and is in the sector.
01180             pSoldier = MercPtrs[ i ];
01181             if( !pSoldier->bActive || !pSoldier->bInSector )
01182                   continue;
01183             //Soldier is here.  Calculate his screen position based on his current gridno.
01184             
01185 
01186             GetOverheadScreenXYFromGridNo( pSoldier->sGridNo, &sX, &sY );
01187             //Now, draw his "doll"
01188 
01189             //adjust for position.
01190             sX += 2;
01191             sY -= 5;
01192             //sScreenY -= 7;  //height of doll
01193 
01194             if( !gfTacticalPlacementGUIActive && pSoldier->bLastRenderVisibleValue == -1 && !(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags&SHOW_ALL_MERCS) )
01195             {
01196                   continue;
01197             }
01198 
01199             if ( pSoldier->sGridNo == NOWHERE )
01200             {
01201                   continue;
01202             }
01203 
01204             sY -= ( GetOffsetLandHeight( pSoldier->sGridNo ) /5);
01205 
01206             // Adjust for height...
01207             sY -= ( pSoldier->sHeightAdjustment / 5 );
01208 
01209             sY += ( gsRenderHeight / 5 );
01210 
01211             // Adjust shade a bit...
01212             SetObjectShade( hVObject, 0 );
01213 
01214             // If on roof....
01215             if ( pSoldier->sHeightAdjustment )
01216             {
01217                   SetObjectShade( hVObject, 1 );
01218             }
01219 
01220             if ( pSoldier->ubID == gusSelectedSoldier )
01221             {
01222                   if( gfRadarCurrentGuyFlash && !gfTacticalPlacementGUIActive )
01223                   {
01224                         SetObjectShade( hVObject, 2 );
01225                   }
01226             }
01227 
01228             // Smaller maps
01229             if (gsStartRestrictedX > 0)
01230             {
01231                   sX += gsStartRestrictedX;
01232             }
01233             // Full size maps
01234             else
01235             {
01236                   sX += iOffsetHorizontal;
01237             }
01238 
01239             // Smaller maps
01240             if (gsStartRestrictedY > 0)
01241             {
01242                   sY += gsStartRestrictedY;
01243             }
01244             // Full size maps
01245             else
01246             {
01247                   sY += iOffsetVertical;
01248             }
01249 
01250             #ifdef JA2EDITOR
01251             if( gfEditMode && gpSelected && gpSelected->pSoldier == pSoldier )
01252             { //editor:  show the selected edited merc as the yellow one.
01253                   Blt8BPPDataTo16BPPBufferTransparent((UINT16*)pDestBuf, uiDestPitchBYTES, hVObject, sX, sY, 0 );
01254             }
01255             else
01256             #endif
01257             if( !gfTacticalPlacementGUIActive )
01258             { //normal 
01259                   Blt8BPPDataTo16BPPBufferTransparent((UINT16*)pDestBuf, uiDestPitchBYTES, hVObject, sX, sY, pSoldier->bTeam );
01260                   RegisterBackgroundRect(BGND_FLAG_SINGLE, NULL, sX, sY, (INT16)(sX + 3), (INT16)(sY + 9)); 
01261             }
01262             else if( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE )
01263             { //vehicle
01264                   Blt8BPPDataTo16BPPBufferTransparent((UINT16*)pDestBuf, uiDestPitchBYTES, hVObject, sX, sY, 9 );
01265                   RegisterBackgroundRect(BGND_FLAG_SINGLE, NULL, (INT16)(sX-6), (INT16)(sY), (INT16)(sX + 9), (INT16)(sY + 10)); 
01266             }
01267             //else if( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & (SOLDIER_PASSENGER | SOLDIER_DRIVER) )
01268             //{// //don't draw person, because they are inside the vehicle.
01269             //    ubPassengers++;
01270             //}
01271             else if( gpTacticalPlacementSelectedSoldier == pSoldier )
01272             { //tactical placement selected merc
01273                   Blt8BPPDataTo16BPPBufferTransparent((UINT16*)pDestBuf, uiDestPitchBYTES, hVObject, sX, sY, 7 );
01274                   RegisterBackgroundRect(BGND_FLAG_SINGLE, NULL, (INT16)(sX-2), (INT16)(sY-2), (INT16)(sX + 5), (INT16)(sY + 11)); 
01275             }
01276             else if( gpTacticalPlacementHilightedSoldier == pSoldier && pSoldier->uiStatusFlags )
01277             { //tactical placement hilighted merc
01278                   Blt8BPPDataTo16BPPBufferTransparent((UINT16*)pDestBuf, uiDestPitchBYTES, hVObject, sX, sY, 8 );
01279                   RegisterBackgroundRect(BGND_FLAG_SINGLE, NULL, (INT16)(sX-2), (INT16)(sY-2), (INT16)(sX + 5), (INT16)(sY + 11)); 
01280             }
01281             else
01282             { //normal 
01283                   Blt8BPPDataTo16BPPBufferTransparent((UINT16*)pDestBuf, uiDestPitchBYTES, hVObject, sX, sY, pSoldier->bTeam );
01284                   RegisterBackgroundRect(BGND_FLAG_SINGLE, NULL, sX, sY, (INT16)(sX + 3), (INT16)(sY + 9)); 
01285             }
01286             if( ubPassengers )
01287             {
01288                   SetFont( SMALLCOMPFONT );
01289                   SetFontForeground( FONT_WHITE );
01290                   gprintfdirty( (INT16)(sX - 3), sY, L"%d", ubPassengers );
01291                   mprintf_buffer( pDestBuf, uiDestPitchBYTES, SMALLCOMPFONT, sX - 3,  sY , L"%d", ubPassengers );
01292             }
01293       }
01294 
01295 
01296       //ITEMS OVERLAY
01297       if( !gfTacticalPlacementGUIActive )
01298       {
01299             for( i = 0 ; i < guiNumWorldItems; i++  )
01300             {
01301                   pWorldItem = &gWorldItems[ i ];
01302                   if( !pWorldItem || !pWorldItem->fExists || pWorldItem->bVisible != VISIBLE && !(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & SHOW_ALL_ITEMS) )
01303                   {
01304                         continue;
01305                   }
01306 
01307                   GetOverheadScreenXYFromGridNo( pWorldItem->sGridNo, &sX, &sY );
01308 
01309                   //adjust for position.
01310                   //sX += 2;
01311                   sY += 6;
01312                   sY -= ( GetOffsetLandHeight( pWorldItem->sGridNo ) /5);
01313 
01314                   sY += ( gsRenderHeight / 5 );
01315 
01316                   // Smaller maps
01317                   if (gsStartRestrictedX > 0)
01318                   {
01319                         sX += gsStartRestrictedX;
01320                   }
01321                   // Full size maps
01322                   else
01323                   {
01324                         sX += iOffsetHorizontal;
01325                   }
01326                   
01327                   // Smaller maps
01328                   if (gsStartRestrictedY > 0)
01329                   {
01330                         sY += gsStartRestrictedY;
01331                   }
01332                   // Full size maps
01333                   else
01334                   {
01335                         sY += iOffsetVertical;
01336                   }
01337 
01338                   /*sX += iOffsetHorizontal + gsStartRestrictedX;
01339                   sY += iOffsetVertical + gsStartRestrictedY;*/
01340 
01341                   if ( gfRadarCurrentGuyFlash )
01342                   {
01343                         usLineColor = Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 0, 0, 0 ) );
01344                   }
01345                   else switch( pWorldItem->bVisible )
01346                   {
01347                         case HIDDEN_ITEM:                   usLineColor = Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB(   0,   0, 255 ) );    break;
01348                         case BURIED:                                    usLineColor = Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 255,   0,   0 ) );    break;
01349                         case HIDDEN_IN_OBJECT:  usLineColor = Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB(   0,   0, 255 ) );    break;
01350                         case INVISIBLE:                           usLineColor = Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB(   0, 255,   0 ) );  break;
01351                         case VISIBLE:                                   usLineColor = Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 255, 255, 255 ) );    break;
01352                   }
01353 
01354                   if ( gfOverItemPool && gsOveritemPoolGridNo == pWorldItem->sGridNo )
01355                   {
01356                         usLineColor = Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 255,   0,   0 ) );
01357                   }
01358 
01359                   PixelDraw( FALSE, sX, sY, usLineColor, (INT8 *)pDestBuf );
01360 
01361                   InvalidateRegion( sX, sY, (INT16)( sX + 1 ), (INT16)( sY + 1 ) );
01362 
01363             }
01364       }
01365 
01366       UnLockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER );
01367 }

01554 
01555 void ClickOverheadRegionCallback(MOUSE_REGION *reg,INT32 reason)
01556 {
01557       UINT32 uiCellX, uiCellY;
01558       INT16  sWorldScreenX, sWorldScreenY;
01559 
01560       if( gfTacticalPlacementGUIActive )
01561       {
01562             HandleTacticalPlacementClicksInOverheadMap( reg, reason );
01563             return;
01564       }
01565 
01566       if (!(reg->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED))
01567             return;
01568 
01569       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
01570       {
01571             reg->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
01572       }
01573       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
01574       {
01575             reg->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
01576 
01577             // Smaller maps
01578             if (gsStartRestrictedX > 0)
01579             {
01580             sWorldScreenX = ( gusMouseXPos - gsStartRestrictedX ) * 5;
01581             }
01582             // Full size maps
01583             else
01584             {
01585                   sWorldScreenX = (gusMouseXPos - iOffsetHorizontal) * 5;
01586             }
01587 
01588             // Smaller maps
01589             if (gsStartRestrictedY > 0)
01590             {
01591             sWorldScreenY = ( gusMouseYPos - gsStartRestrictedY ) * 5;
01592             }
01593             // Full size maps
01594             else
01595             {
01596                   sWorldScreenY = (gusMouseYPos - iOffsetVertical) * 5;
01597             }
01598 
01599             // Get new proposed center location.
01600             GetFromAbsoluteScreenXYWorldXY( (INT32 *)&uiCellX, (INT32 *)&uiCellY, sWorldScreenX, sWorldScreenY );
01601 
01602             SetRenderCenter( (INT16)uiCellX, (INT16)uiCellY );
01603 
01604             KillOverheadMap();
01605 
01606       }
01607       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_DWN)
01608       {
01609             KillOverheadMap();
01610       }
01611 }

01616 }

01620 void GetOverheadScreenXYFromGridNo( INT16 sGridNo, INT16 *psScreenX, INT16 *psScreenY )
01621 {
01622       GetWorldXYAbsoluteScreenXY( (INT16)(CenterX( sGridNo ) / CELL_X_SIZE ), (INT16)( CenterY( sGridNo ) / CELL_Y_SIZE ), psScreenX, psScreenY ); 
01623       *psScreenX /= 5;
01624       *psScreenY /= 5;
01625 
01626       *psScreenX += 5;
01627       *psScreenY += 5;
01628 
01629       //Subtract the height....
01630   //*psScreenY -= gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].sHeight / 5;
01631 }

01633 // WANNE
01634 // Fixed bug from sir tech, which occured on smaller maps ;-)
01635 BOOLEAN GetOverheadMouseGridNo( INT16 *psGridNo )
01636 {
01637       UINT32 uiCellX, uiCellY;
01638       INT16  sWorldScreenX, sWorldScreenY;
01639 
01640       if ( ( OverheadRegion.uiFlags & MSYS_MOUSE_IN_AREA ) )
01641       {
01642             // ATE: Adjust alogrithm values a tad to reflect map positioning
01643             // Smaller maps
01644             if (gsStartRestrictedX > 0)
01645             {
01646                   sWorldScreenX = (gusMouseXPos - 5) * 5 - gsStartRestrictedX * 5;
01647             }
01648             // Full size maps
01649             else
01650             {
01651                   sWorldScreenX = (gusMouseXPos - 5) * 5 - iOffsetHorizontal * 5;
01652             }
01653 
01654             // Smaller maps
01655             if (gsStartRestrictedY > 0)
01656             {
01657                   sWorldScreenY = (gusMouseYPos - 8) * 5 - gsStartRestrictedY * 5;
01658             }
01659             // Full size maps
01660             else
01661             {
01662                   sWorldScreenY = (gusMouseYPos - 8) * 5 - iOffsetVertical * 5;
01663             }
01664 
01665             // Get new proposed center location.
01666             GetFromAbsoluteScreenXYWorldXY( (INT32 *)&uiCellX, (INT32 *)&uiCellY, sWorldScreenX, sWorldScreenY );
01667 
01668             // Get gridNo
01669             (*psGridNo ) = (INT16)MAPROWCOLTOPOS( ( uiCellY / CELL_Y_SIZE ), ( uiCellX / CELL_X_SIZE ) );
01670 
01671             // Adjust for height.....
01672             sWorldScreenY =sWorldScreenY + gpWorldLevelData[ (*psGridNo) ].sHeight;
01673 
01674             GetFromAbsoluteScreenXYWorldXY( (INT32 *)&uiCellX, (INT32 *)&uiCellY, sWorldScreenX, sWorldScreenY );
01675 
01676             // Get gridNo
01677             (*psGridNo ) = (INT16)MAPROWCOLTOPOS( ( uiCellY / CELL_Y_SIZE ), ( uiCellX / CELL_X_SIZE ) );
01678 
01679 
01680             return( TRUE );
01681       }
01682       else
01683       {
01684             return( FALSE );
01685       }
01686 }

01691 BOOLEAN GetOverheadMouseGridNoForFullSoldiersGridNo( INT16 *psGridNo )
01692 {

01694       INT16  sWorldScreenX, sWorldScreenY;
01695

01700             if (gsStartRestrictedX > 0)
01701             {
01702                   sWorldScreenX = (gusMouseXPos - 5) * 5 - gsStartRestrictedX * 5;
01703             }
01704             // Full size maps
01705             else
01706             {
01707                   sWorldScreenX = ( gusMouseXPos - 5 ) * 5 - iOffsetHorizontal * 5;

01717             {
01718                   sWorldScreenY = ( gusMouseYPos ) * 5 - iOffsetVertical * 5;
01719             }

01745 // This method is used for smaller overhead maps, to calculate the non visible borders to make them black
01746 // It is also used to get the starting (x and y coordinate)
01747 void CalculateRestrictedMapCoords( INT8 bDirection, INT16 *psX1, INT16 *psY1, INT16 *psX2, INT16 *psY2, INT16 sEndXS, INT16 sEndYS )
01748 {
01749       switch( bDirection )
01750       {
01751             case NORTH:
01752                   *psX1 = iOffsetHorizontal;
01753                   *psX2 = sEndXS;
01754                   *psY1 = iOffsetVertical;
01755                   *psY2 = ( abs( NORMAL_MAP_SCREEN_TY - gsTLY ) / 5) + iOffsetVertical;
01756                   break;
01757 
01758             case EAST:
01759                   *psX1 = iOffsetHorizontal;
01760                   *psX2 = ( abs( -NORMAL_MAP_SCREEN_X - gsTLX ) / 5 ) + iOffsetHorizontal;
01761                   *psY1 = iOffsetVertical;
01762                   *psY2 = sEndYS;
01763                   break;
01764 
01765             case SOUTH:
01766                   *psX1 = iOffsetHorizontal;
01767                   *psX2 = sEndXS;
01768                   *psY1 = ( NORMAL_MAP_SCREEN_HEIGHT - abs( NORMAL_MAP_SCREEN_BY - gsBLY )) / 5 + iOffsetVertical ;
01769                   *psY2 = sEndYS;
01770                   break;
01771 
01772             case WEST:
01773                   *psX1 = ( NORMAL_MAP_SCREEN_WIDTH - abs( NORMAL_MAP_SCREEN_X - gsTRX )) / 5 + iOffsetHorizontal;
01774                   *psX2 = sEndXS;
01775                   *psY1 = iOffsetVertical;
01776                   *psY2 = sEndYS;
01777                   break;
01778       }
01779 }
01780 
01781 void CopyOverheadDBShadetablesFromTileset( )
01782 {
01783       UINT32                              uiLoop, uiLoop2;
01784       PTILE_IMAGERY   pTileSurf;
01785 
01786 
01787       // Loop through tileset
01788       for (uiLoop = 0; uiLoop < NUMBEROFTILETYPES; uiLoop++)
01789       {
01790             pTileSurf = ( gTileSurfaceArray[ uiLoop ] );
01791 
01792             gSmTileSurf[ uiLoop ].vo->fFlags |= VOBJECT_FLAG_SHADETABLE_SHARED;
01793 
01794             for (uiLoop2 = 0; uiLoop2 < HVOBJECT_SHADE_TABLES; uiLoop2++)
01795             {
01796                   gSmTileSurf[ uiLoop ].vo->pShades[ uiLoop2 ] = pTileSurf->vo->pShades[ uiLoop2 ];
01797             }
01798       }
01799             
01800 }
01801 
01802 void TrashOverheadMap( )
01803 {
01804       // If loaded, unload!
01805       if ( gfSmTileLoaded )
01806       {
01807             //Unload
01808             DeleteOverheadDB( );
01809 
01810             // Force load
01811             gfSmTileLoaded = FALSE;
01812       }           
01813 }
